summary: "The Catcher in the Rye" is a famous book by J.D. Salinger. It's about a teenager named Holden Caulfield who struggles with feeling alone and frustrated with the world. He shares his thoughts and experiences as he tries to figure out his place in society. The book is popular among teens because it talks about growing up and feeling misunderstood. It's considered one of the best English novels of the 20th century and sells over a million copies every year.
title: The Catcher in the Rye
